mapper.select: SELECT `t_tag`.* FROM `t_tag`,`t_dish_tag_printer` WHERE `t_dish_tag_printer`.`printer_id` = #{id} AND `t_dish_tag_printer`.`type` = 1 AND `t_dish_tag_printer`.`dish_tag_id` = `t_tag`.`id` ORDER BY `t_tag`.`id`

SELECT `t_dish`.`name` FROM `t_dish`,`t_dish_tag_printer` WHERE `t_dish_tag_printer`.`printer_id` = #{id} AND `t_dish_tag_printer`.`type` = 2 AND `t_dish_tag_printer`.`dish_tag_id` = `t_dish`.`id` ORDER BY `t_dish`.`id`

SELECT `t_tag`.* FROM `t_tag`,`t_dish_tag_printer` WHERE `t_dish_tag_printer`.`printer_id` = 0 AND `t_dish_tag_printer`.`dish_tag_id` = `t_tag`.`id` AND `t_dish_tag_printer`.`type` = 1 ORDER BY `t_tag`.`id`
